scripts.minify: minify style.css > minified-style.css; minify brain.js sound.js cursor.js flying-focus-ring.js > minified-code.js;
scripts.build: yarn minify || npm run minify; bash copy-to-public-folder.sh;
scripts.start: yarn stop || npm run stop; yarn build || npm run build; node index.js & open http://localhost:8000
scripts.sbs: yarn stop || npm run stop; yarn build || npm run build; yarn start || npm run start;
scripts.continuous-restart: nodemon -e js,html,css -x 'yarn build; node index.js;' --ignore public --ignore 'minified*.*';
scripts.surge: yarn build; surge public https://hchiam.surge.sh; open https://hchiam.surge.sh;
scripts.reminder: echo; echo 'Reminders: Did you build first? Do you need to [skip ci]?'; echo;

hooks.pre-commit: npm run reminder; if (npm test); then npm run reminder; else (npm run reminder; exit 1); fi;
